SEARCH
Package com.krisi.crypto.service

Class TransactionService

java.lang.Object
com.krisi.crypto.service.TransactionService
@Service public class TransactionService extends Object
Service class for managing cryptocurrency transactions of users. This service handles creating, retrieving, deleting, and resetting transactions for users.

    • getAllTransactionsByUser

      public List<Transaction> getAllTransactionsByUser(Long id)
      Retrieves all transactions for a specific user based on their ID.
      Parameters:
      id - The ID of the user whose transactions are to be retrieved
      Returns:
      List of Transaction objects associated with the given user

    • createTransaction

      Creates and saves a new transaction.
      Parameters:

      Returns:
      The saved Transaction object

    • deleteTransaction

      public void deleteTransaction(Long id)
      Deletes a transaction based on its ID.
      Parameters:
      id - The ID of the transaction to be deleted

    • resetUser

      public void resetUser(User user)
      Resets all transactions for a given user by deleting them from the repository.
      Parameters:
      user - The User whose transactions should be deleted
